original_title: Doctor Who: Daleks - The Early Years
overview: A documentary which, as the name suggests, is about the early years of the Daleks. Presented by Peter Davison, it contains many interviews and clips plus full episodes from the incomplete stories "The Dalek Master Planet" episodes 5 & 10 and "The Evil of the Daleks" episode 2.
title: Doctor Who: Daleks - The Early Years
